author: mor
msg: Added a flag keepAddressBook (default is Y) on Customer events for One Page Checkout. If keepAddressBook is set to Y and a user edit the address during checkout, it will create a new address. This is way to support address book functionality. A user can always delete a address from Profile page.

author: brett
msg: [MNG-2477] rewrite the POM on deployment without elements that old versions of Maven won't understand. Needs improvement, but this revision would be useful for other elements in the interim while we wait for better repository metadata
